Notes: Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory. 2-aff-red/2-aff-blue At start of your act, if insane, gain +1 speed.
jewelry, Accessory. Armor 3 on head. At the start of your act, if you have any +1 strength tokens, reveal the next 4 monster hit locations and put them back in any order.
item, bone, heavy. If adjacent to the monster when you suffer a severe body injury, the monster suffers a wound. Limit, once per round.
1/6/5. Block 2: spend move to ignore 2 hits next time you are attacked (up until your next act). You cannot block more than once per attack. Shield adds +2 armor to all locations.

2/7+/3 The shield has a myriad of eyes on the front to confuse the opponent. If a trap hit location card is drawn during your attacks, discard it and draw another hit location card. 1x/attack. Block 1.
Craft: 1x scarab shell, 1x compound eye, 1x web silk

Notes: 1/7+/4 weapon,melee,shield,metal. Block 1. The first time you block a hit each showdown, gain the priority target token. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.
jewelry, amber. Accessory. 3x 0.5-aff-blue = If you are the monster controller when the monster draws AI, draw 1 extra card. Select 1 to play and discard the other.
Whenever you spend movement, the scales' color shift. Gain +1 evasion until your next act.
When you spend movement, you Shadow Walk and may move through occupied spaces without causing collision. 1x 0.5-aff-blue / 2x 1-aff-red = +1 accuracy
Craft: 1x cycloid scales, 1x scrap, 1x huge sunteeth, 1x salt

Notes: 1x 0.5-aff-blue / 1x 0.5-aff-green = Spend movement: You are not a threat until you attack. If you have the priority target token, gain 2 survival and remove it.
1x 0.5-aff-green / 3x 1-aff-blue = When you depart, gain survival equal to the number of blue affinities you have.
When you Shadow Walk and attack a monster from its blind spot, your weapon gains +1 accuracy and Sharp for that attack.
Craft: 1x cycloid scales, 1x bone, 1x small sunteeth, 1x salt

Notes: Unique, irreplaceable, accessory (not armor). If you have NO affinities, gain +4 luck and suffer -4 to all severe injury rolls.
armor,set,metal. You are not knocked down from suffering a heavy injury.
armor,set,metal. Gain +2 movement during your act.
armor,set,metal
armor,set,metal. At the start of the showdown, you beat your chest mightily and gain survival up to the survival limit.
Craft: 1x horn fragment, 1x iron, 1x hardened ribs, 1x leather

Notes: armor,set,bone,metal. Gain +1 to all severe heady injury roll results. Ignore shattered jaw severe injury result.
3/7/0 weapon. Block 1. 1-aff-green/1-aff-blue/1-aff-red = reduce any suffered brain damage by 1, to min of 1. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.
2/5+/9. weapon,set,melee,shield,metal. Block 2. Add 2 to all hit locations (as shown). While you carry this, reduce star damage from monster level by 1.
Craft: 1x beacon shield, 1x underplate fungus, 1x sleeping virus flower, 1x elixir of life

Notes: armor,heavy. +1 Accuracy. 3x 1-aff-green = While you are being attacked, the monster has -1 speed.
Unique, irreplaceable, accessory (not armor). At the start of your act, if insane gain +1 action. During settlement phase, you may archive this item to build the mask maker location.
Craft: Either defeat lvl 3 Butcher and roll 10 or combo of lvl 1-2 and also crit wound his head

Notes: Unique, irreplaceable, accessory (not armor). 2-aff-red/2-aff-green/2-aff-blue = at start of action, if insane then gain +1 survival.
armor, set, gormskin, heavy. Other survivors may move through but not end movement in a space you occupy.
armor, set, gormskin, heavy. 1x 0.5-aff-blue / 1x 0.5-aff-green = If your courage is higher than the monster level, ignore Intimidate actions.
armor, set, gormskin, heavy. 2x 1-aff-green = You may Guard without spending survival (see Gorment Suit for Guard).

armor, set, gormskin, heavy. 1x 1-aff-blue / 1x 0.5-aff-green / 1x 1-aff-green = Guard: at the end of your attack, if you are standing and have a shield, spend 1 survival to move 3 spaces directly away from monster and Block 1 for free.
armor,set,bone,heavy,metal. You may use the Tumble fighting art (even if you don't know it). You successfully tumble on 2+ instead of 6+.
Craft: 1x iron, 1x Flower Knight Badge, 1x calcified greaves, 3x bone

Notes: armor,set,metal,other. +1 evasion. After drawing hit locations from an attack, you may discard First Strike hit location card.
armor,set,metal. +2 strength. +6 luck when attempting to wound Parry locations.
armor,set,bone,metal. +1 luck. When a monster attacks you, you may elect to take a hit on the head and roll 1d10. On 6+, ignore the hit. If adjacent, monster suffers 1 wound.
Craft: 1x scell, 1x beetle horn, 1x DBK Errant Badge

Notes: armor,set,metal,gormskin. At the start of the showdown, draw 3 tactics cards. When you attack, the extra weight grants leverage. Your weapon gains the club keyword.
Craft: 1x Lion Knights left claw, 2x iron, 3x leather, 1x scarab shell

Notes: 2/7/4. Shield. Block 1. When you wound with this shield, you may spend 1 survival to add 1 armor to all hit locations. Limit 1x/attack.
Craft: Spidicules, destroy Legless Ball, get shield.

Notes: 2/4+/7 weapon,melee,shield,metal,heavy. Block 2. When the monster performs Unseen Agony or Meltdown, roll 1d10. On 2+ you suffer no damage. Shield adds +2 armor to all locations.
Mask. Accessory. Gain +1 strength. At the start of the showdown, if you are fighting the Lion Knight, choose your Role card.
3/7+/1 Block 1. Once per round, if you wound with this weapon, Block 1 for free. Shield adds +0 armor to all locations.
-2 movement. 2x 0.5-aff-blue/2x 0.5-aff-green = when you depart, add 3 armor to all hit locations with metal armor.
0.5-aff-green = +2 accuracy with club weapons.
2x 0.5-aff-red/0.5-aff-blue = +2 movement
0.5-aff-blue = ear plugs, you are deaf and have -1 accuracy.
2x 0.5-aff-green = at end of your act, you may move 1 space.
When you depart, gain +2 survival.
When you depart, gain +2 insanity.

Reduce damage from every hit suffered by 1, to min of 1.

When you depart, gain +1 insanity.
If insane, gain +2 movement
0.5-aff-blue/1-aff-green/1-aff-red = if insane at start of showdown, gain +1 evasion token.

Notes: Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory. 4x 1-aff-red = if insane, you may dodge 1 additional time per round.
0.5-aff-green/0.5-aff-blue/0.5-aff-red = if insane, ignore the first hit each round and suffer 1 brain damage instead.
Armor - can replace Rawhide set helm. You may spend survival while Frenzied.
Craft: 1x monster tooth necklace, 1x skull, 1x prismatic gills. Also found in Paul the Savior scenario.

Notes: When you depart, gain +1 survival.
When you depart, gain +1 survival.
0.5-aff-blue = spend action to reveal the top 2 AI cards. Place them back on top in any order.
0.5-aff-blue/0.5-aff-red = +1 evasion

item, gorm. Accessory. 2x 1-aff-green / 1x 0.5-aff-green = At the end of the showdown, remove any permanent injuries you suffered this showdown.
1/8/1 weapon. Block 1: spend action to ignore 1 hit location next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. Max 1 block/attack. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.
armor,set,leather. Takes the place of the leather mask and cuirass in the leather set. No special properties.
2/7/3 weapon. Block 1: spend action to ignore 1 hit location next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. Max 1 block/attack. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.
When you Slam, you may pass through other survivors without causing collision.
Slam: Spend move to move forward in a straight line. If you move 4+ and stop adjacent to monster, then move it back 1 space. It gains -1 toughness until end of round.
Spend action to Scream: non-deaf insane survivors gain +1 movement until end of round. All other survivors gain +1 insanity.
When you depart, gain +1 insanity.
Reduce damage from every hit location by 2, to a minimum of 1. You may not have any heavy or metal gear in your gear grid.
2x 0.5-aff-green = +1 movement. Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to gain 2 insanity.
When you depart, gain 1 survival. 2x 0.5-aff-red / 1x 0.5-aff-blue = Spend action to add 1 to all hit locations. Use 1x/showdown.
When you depart, gain 1 survival. 2x 0.5-aff-green = Spend action to add 1 to all hit locations. Use once per showdown.
1x 0.5-aff-green / 1x 0.5-aff-blue = Spend action to turn the monster to face away from you. Use only during the survivor's turn.
When you suffer a severe head injury, the skull helm is destroyed.
1/6/6 weapon. Irreplaceable. -3 movement. Spend action or 1 survival to ignore a hit. Shield adds +0 armor to all locations.
2x 0.5-aff-red = +1 movement
Pounce: spend move+action to move 3 spaces in straight line. If you moved 3 spaces, activate a melee weapon with +1 strength.
When you Pounce, gain +1 accuracy for your next attack (all rolls).
Spend action and 1 survival to Roar: Non-deaf insane survivors gain +2 strength until end of round. All other survivors gain +1 insanity.
Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory (not armor). 2x 1-aff-green = spend action to lose all your survival and gain that many +1 strength tokens.
